body:
The flake is encountered after I enable the watch cache in #26494. I don't know if it's related. The flake shouldn't occur either with watch cache disabled or enabled.

```
--- FAIL: TestPersistentVolumeMultiPVs (0.53s)
    persistent_volumes_test.go:237: Only 1 PV should be bound but got 0
```
